speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Lisa from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Lisa, I'm doing well. What can I help you with?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with City Bank. Can I please verify your identity? Could you provide your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Could you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming your identity. Your current balance is $450. How would you like to proceed with this payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $100 today, and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I'll note that down. How would you like to make that payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can do it via credit card over the phone.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! Let me take your credit card details.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you! Your payment of $100 has been successfully processed. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that will be all. Thank you for your help!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day!
